title: One Bert Show Member's Sweet Gesture Turned Into The Most Embarrassing Moment Of Their Life!
description:
Over the weekend, Moe decided to surprise his youngest sister by taking her to a Chris Brown concert. They were both super excited to attend, but something very embarrassing happened to Moe.
What happened? Let's just say he almost injured himself and others trying to do something sweet for his sister.
